__e: Actually, Monk, that's why I'm calling.
Doctor, if I'm right and Monk is out there... and he doesn't know who he is, what can we expect?
Mr. Monk, are you sure, you're okay?
MR. MONK HAS BEEN HIRED BY THE CLARK FAMILY TO LOOK INTO THE CASE,
Mr. Monk, is. Is that really how you see me?
No, the affidavit says the source told them the date of your re-supply, they followed Monk and others to the warehouse, followed him out, and found the drugs.
Um, actually... Mr. Monk, it's not completely over.
Oh, Monk, I don't want to talk to you right now.
No, no, Mr. Monk, we haven't found the captain's son.
Mr. Monk, do you have idea what you've done to me?
Apparently it was something Monk said about you at the House. - What?
Mr. Monk, you just need to get out of the house, you know, go someplace.
